name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms; If not specified, it takes the value of 'for' prop, if it exists
name.desc_cn: 用于指定控件的名称；处理表单时有用；如果未指定，则采用“for”属性的值（如果存在）

accept.desc: Comma separated list of unique file type specifiers. Maps to 'accept' attribute of native input type=file element
accept.desc_cn: 以逗号分隔的唯一文件类型说明符列表。映射到原生输入类型=文件元素的“accept”属性

capture.desc: Optionally, specify that a new file should be captured, and which device should be used to capture that new media of a type defined by the 'accept' prop. Maps to 'capture' attribute of native input type=file element
capture.desc_cn: （可选）指定应捕获新文件，以及应使用哪个设备捕获由“accept”属性定义的类型的新媒体。映射到原生输入类型=文件元素的“capture”属性

max-file-size.desc: Maximum size of individual file in bytes
max-file-size.desc_cn: 单个文件的最大大小（字节）

max-total-size.desc: Maximum size of all files combined in bytes
max-total-size.desc_cn: 所有文件的最大大小（以字节为单位）

max-files.desc: Maximum number of files to contain

filter.desc: Custom filter for added files; Only files that pass this filter will be added to the queue and uploaded; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

files.desc: Candidate files to be added to queue
files.desc_cn: 要添加到队列的候选文件

returns.desc: Filtered files to be added to queue
returns.desc_cn: 要添加到队列的过滤的文件

filter.desc_cn: 添加文件的自定义过滤器；只有通过此过滤器的文件才会添加到队列并上载；为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围中引用它，而不要内联定义它

model-value.desc: Model of the component; Must be FileList or Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

error-message.desc: Validation error message (gets displayed only if 'error' is set to 'true')
examples: Username must have at least 5 characters
error-message.desc_cn: 验证错误消息（仅当“error”设置为“true”时显示）

no-error-icon.desc: Hide error icon when there is an error
no-error-icon.desc_cn: 出现错误时隐藏错误图标

rules.desc: Array of Functions/Strings; If String, then it must be a name of one of the embedded validation rules
examples: :rules="[ (val, rules) => rules.email(val) || 'Please enter a valid email address' ]"
rules.desc_cn: 函数/字符串数组；如果是字符串，则它必须是嵌入式验证规则的其中一个名称

reactive-rules.desc: By default a change in the rules does not trigger a new validation until the model changes; If set to true then a change in the rules will trigger a validation; Has a performance penalty, so use it only when you really need it
reactive-rules.desc_cn: 默认情况下，在模型更改之前，规则的更改不会触发新的验证；如果设置为true，则规则中的更改将触发验证；有一个性能损失，所以只有当你真的需要它时使用它

lazy-rules.desc: If set to boolean true then it checks validation status against the 'rules' only after field loses focus for first time; If set to 'ondemand' then it will trigger only when component's validate() method is manually called or when the wrapper QForm submits itself
lazy-rules.desc_cn: 如果设置为布尔真，则只有在字段第一次失去焦点后，它才会根据“rule”检查验证状态；如果设置为“ondemand”，则仅当手动调用组件的validate()方法或当包装器QForm提交自身时才会触发

label.desc: A text label that will “float” up above the input field, once the field gets focus
label.desc_cn: 一种文本标签，一旦字段获得焦点，它将“浮动”到输入字段上方

stack-label.desc: Label will be always shown above the field regardless of field content (if any)
stack-label.desc_cn: 标签将始终显示在字段上方，而不考虑字段内容（如果有）

hint.desc: Helper (hint) text which gets placed below your wrapped form component
hint.desc_cn: 辅助（提示）文本，放在包装的窗体组件下面

hide-hint.desc: Hide the helper (hint) text when field doesn't have focus
hide-hint.desc_cn: 当字段没有焦点时隐藏辅助（提示）文本

label-color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused
label-color.desc_cn: 标签的来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称；覆盖“color”属性；与“color”prop的区别在于，标签将始终具有此颜色，即使字段未聚焦

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

bg-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
bg-color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

loading.desc: Signals the user a process is in progress by displaying a spinner; Spinner can be customized by using the 'loading' slot.
loading.desc_cn: 通过显示旋转器向用户发出进程正在进行的信号；可以使用“loading”槽自定义转器。

clearable.desc: Appends clearable icon when a value (not undefined or null) is set; When clicked, model becomes null
clearable.desc_cn: 设置值（非undefined或null）时附加可清除图标；单击时，模型将变为空

clear-icon.desc: Custom icon to use for the clear button when using along with 'clearable' prop
clear-icon.desc_cn: 与“clearable”属性一起使用时用于清除按钮的自定义图标

outlined.desc_cn: 对字段使用“轮廓线”设计

borderless.desc_cn: 对字段采用“无边界”设计

standout.desc: Use 'standout' design for the field; Specifies classes to be applied when focused (overriding default ones)
standout.desc_cn: 对字段采用“突出”设计；指定聚焦时要应用的类（覆盖默认类）

label-slot.desc: Enables label slot; You need to set it to force use of the 'label' slot if the 'label' prop is not set
label-slot.desc_cn: 启用标签槽；如果未设置“label”属性，则需要将其设置为强制使用“label”插槽

hide-bottom-space.desc: Do not reserve space for hint/error/counter anymore when these are not used; As a result, it also disables the animation for those; It also allows the hint/error area to stretch vertically based on its content
hide-bottom-space.desc_cn: 不使用error/hint/counter时，不要再为其保留空间；因此，它也会禁用这些对象的动画；它还允许hint/error区域根据其内容进行垂直拉伸

counter.desc: Show an automatic counter on bottom right
counter.desc_cn: 在右下角显示自动计数器

rounded.desc: Applies a small standard border-radius for a squared shape of the component
rounded.desc_cn: 为组件应用较小标准的边框圆角（border-radius）

square.desc: Remove border-radius so borders are squared; Overrides 'rounded' prop
square.desc_cn: 去除border-radius，使边界为正方形；覆盖“rounded”属性

dense.desc_cn: 紧凑模式，占用更少的空间

item-aligned.desc: Match inner content alignment to that of QItem
item-aligned.desc_cn: 将内部内容对齐方式与QItem匹配

autofocus.desc: Focus field on initial component render
autofocus.desc_cn: 初始组件渲染上的聚焦场

for.desc: Used to specify the 'id' of the control and also the 'for' attribute of the label that wraps it; If no 'name' prop is specified, then it is used for this attribute as well
for.desc_cn: 用于指定控件的“id”以及包装它的标签的“for”属性；如果没有指定'name'属性，那么它也将用于此属性

append.desc: Append file(s) to current model rather than replacing them; Has effect only when using 'multiple' mode
append.desc_cn: 将文件附加到当前模型，而不是替换它们；仅在使用“multiple”模式时有效

display-value.desc: Override default selection string, if not using 'file' or 'selected' scoped slots and if not using 'use-chips' prop
display-value.desc_cn: 如果不使用“file”或“selected”作用域插槽，并且如果不使用“use-chip”属性，则覆盖默认选择字符串

use-chips.desc: Use QChip to show picked files

counter-label.desc: Label for the counter; The 'counter' prop is necessary to enable this one

totalSize.desc: The total size of files in human readable format
totalSize.desc_cn: 人类可读格式的文件的总大小

maxFiles.desc: Maximum number of files (same as 'max-files' prop, if specified); When 'max-files' is not specified, this has 'void 0' as value
maxFiles.desc_cn: 最大文件数（如果指定，与“max-files”属性相同）；如果未指定“max-files”，则其值为“void 0”

props.desc_cn: 包含计数器标签信息的对象

returns.desc: String to display for the counter label
returns.desc_cn: 要为计数器标签显示的字符串

counter-label.desc_cn: 计数器标签；“counter”属性是启用此属性所必需的

input-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the underlying selection container
input-class.desc_cn: 作为基础选择容器属性的类定义

input-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the underlying selection container
input-style.desc_cn: 作为基础选择容器属性的样式定义

prepend.desc: Prepend inner field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn

append.desc: Append to inner field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn

before.desc: Prepend outer field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn

after.desc: Append outer field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn

label.desc: Slot for label; Used only if 'label-slot' prop is set or the 'label' prop is set; When it is used the text in the 'label' prop is ignored
label.desc_cn: 标签槽；仅当设置了“label-slot”属性或设置了“label”属性时使用；使用时，“label”属性中的文本将被忽略

error.desc: Slot for errors; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
error.desc_cn: 错误插槽；仅在使用“bottom-slots”属性时启用；建议：<div>

hint.desc: Slot for hint text; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
hint.desc_cn: 提示文本槽；仅在使用“bottom-slots”属性时启用；建议：<div>

counter.desc: Slot for counter text; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
counter.desc_cn: 计数器文本槽；仅在使用“bottom-slots”属性时启用；建议：<div>

loading.desc: Override default spinner when component is in loading mode; Use in conjunction with 'loading' prop
loading.desc_cn: 当组件处于加载模式时重写默认选装器；与“loading”属性一起使用

file.desc: Override default node to render a file from the user picked list

selected.desc: Override default selection slot; Suggestion: QChip

rejected.desc: Emitted after files are picked and some do not pass the validation props (accept, max-file-size, max-total-size, filter, etc)

rejectedEntries.desc: Array of { failedPropValidation: string, file: File } Objects for files that do not pass the validation
rejectedEntries.desc_cn: 未通过验证的文件的{failedPropValidation:string，file:file}对象数组

rejected.desc_cn: 选取文件后发出，有些文件未通过验证属性（accept、max-file-size、max-total-size、filter等）

clear.desc: When using the 'clearable' property, this event is emitted when the clear icon is clicked

value.desc: The previous value before clearing it

clear.desc_cn: 使用“clearable”属性时，单击清除图标时会发出此事件

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

pickFiles.desc: Trigger file pick; Must be called as a direct consequence of user interaction (eg. in a click handler), due to browsers security policy
pickFiles.desc_cn: 触发文件选取；由于浏览器的安全策略，必须作为用户交互的直接结果调用（例如在单击处理程序中）

returns.desc: True/false if no async rules, otherwise a Promise with the outcome (true -> validation was a success, false -> invalid models detected)
returns.desc_cn: 如果没有异步规则，则为True/false，否则为带有结果的Promise（True->验证成功，false->检测到无效模型）

removeAtIndex.desc: Remove file located at specific index in the model

index.desc: Index at which to remove selection

removeAtIndex.desc_cn: 删除位于模型中特定索引处的文件

removeFile.desc: Remove specified file from the model

file.desc_cn: 要删除的文件（文件的实例）

removeFile.desc_cn: 从模型中删除指定的文件

getNativeElement.desc: DEPRECATED; Access 'nativeEl' directly; Gets the native input DOM Element

returns.desc: The underlying native input DOM Element

hasError.desc: Whether the component is in error state
